cause.description:
people dont know but the major animal food providers IAMS is really abusing the animals. sure you see the loving animals in the chermicals but really all the animals they have are being fushed down toliets, and cut into then left on the floor to die!
1. STOP BUYING IAMS FOR PETS
2. the massive killing must stop
3. IAMS needs to get what they desivre!
cause.name: stop imas from testing
